channel.title: Need Help With My Second Model
channel.description:
Okay, I know I made a few good modellers mad, and I apologize. But, I would appreciate some help with this problem I have.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/245h4cg.jpg[/img]
Just a look at how I've started out.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2vw7huq.jpg[/img]
It is a little 3D, but only from raised faces. The other side has not been added, and i need a few tips with that as well...
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/331hclh.jpg[/img]
Okay, the Move tool isn't working for me for some reason. I need to raise a few faces before going on and mirroring or whatever I decide to do.... And tips on colors would be nice, as green was just to start out. All constructive criticism is welcome.
But, looking at it, I think it is TONS better than the first piece of garbage I made. All thanks to SilentCJ's vid.
[u][b]*UPDATE*[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/35kif83.jpg[/img]
Got it mirrored and everything -- figured out the move tool problem.. It's not together, and I need a lil help =\

item.title: Need Help With My Second Model
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Well…For the colors…Hmmm. Try a black or dark red blade maybe? Looks like a kind of ‘dark’ sword in my opinion…Maybe make the hilt red and add a little gold at the end and maybe the top of the hilt…

Looks awesome, btw. Wish I could model like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With My Second Model

item.title: Need Help With My Second Model
item.dc:creator: @Hellman1 Hellman1
item.description:
@Hellman1 wrote:

Okay, I know I made a few good modellers mad, and I apologize. But, I would appreciate some help with this problem I have.

Just a look at how I’ve started out.

It is a little 3D, but only from raised faces. The other side has not been added, and i need a few tips with that as well…

Okay, the Move tool isn’t working for me for some reason. I need to raise a few faces before going on and mirroring or whatever I decide to do… And tips on colors would be nice, as green was just to start out. All constructive criticism is welcome.

But, looking at it, I think it is TONS better than the first piece of garbage I made. All thanks to SilentCJ’s vid.

UPDATE

Got it mirrored and everything – figured out the move tool problem… It’s not together, and I need a lil help =\
